CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: MOT places stool in front of CHI

INV enters the room at 09:55:10 to explain Small Scale Activity to MOT then leaves the room while Small Scale Activity takes place . INV re-enters at 10:00:41 and explains the Forbidden Object task to MOT . INV gives CHI the rolling pin to play with
<bef> INV sets the Forbidden Object on the table
MOT looks at and leans closer to CHI

MOT puts her head next to CHI and looks at the object
